title: Online Collaborative Writing-Based Mathematics Research Paper Writing Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational academic writing skills, intermediate-level math concept understanding, and basic digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Course focused on strengthening collaborative writing skills for academic mathematics papers. Simulating team-based research activities through web-based collaboration tools like Google Docs, combining formative assessment by instructors with summative evaluation via final paper submission

learning_goals: Learners perform real-time feedback with team members at least three times while drafting a math paper using collaborative web-based tools and develop document version control skills.

Learners design an efficient collaboration process by maintaining a 7:3 strategic usage ratio between text space (content organization) and interface (tool functionality) in online collaborative environments.

Learners compile asynchronous communication records among team members during math research paper writing into a portfolio and reflect them in the introduction-methods-results structure of the final paper.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
